name: Galaxy Phage
description:
Galaxy Phage is a black and white scrolling shooter set in a galaxy full of monstrous creatures called Phages. Fight through four levels, meet a few characters along the way, and save the galaxy.

I've be stuck in my house due to social distancing for the past couple weeks, so I decided to make a spiritual successor to the first game I ever made. I gave myself a time limit of two weeks to make this game.

Takes aprx. 10-20 minutes to play.
